DOC.brief_summary: We would investigate control , randomize open study winter season : 1 ) If serum level vitamin D ( 25 ( OH ) D ) increase subject treat sunbed sunlamp emit mainly UVA 0·5 % 1·4 % UVB compare non-sunbed treated control 2 ) If yes , 25 ( OH ) D serum level dependent UVB dose ?
DOC.brief_title: Does Sunbed Radiation With Mainly UVA Provoke Cutaneous Vitamin D Synthesis Humans ?
DOC.criteria: Healthy Females Above 50 year Younger serum concentration 25 ( OH ) D 50nmol/l No sunbed use last ½ year No sun holiday last ½ year No intake vitamin D 10 microgram/day
